title: higher ping, big delay and lagging
body: So recently ive started getting higher ping and before I would get 30 and would rarely get a lag spike or the occasional attempting to reconnect but all of a sudden ive started getting 50 at the lowest but it never stays there its always going above 100 and often into the 200s 300s and 400s. With this I get big delays in what im doing so I'll press an ability..........there we go and its really annoying as it really messes up gameplay for me. Moving is a right pain with having to wait for me to turn takes a second or two but I mean sometimes its alright and then bam 3000ms. Yes I had this. Its just not going anywhere. Anyone else got this recently?

replies.body:
Big spikes in latency are typically a result of your connection to the server being unstable. This could be caused by routing issues to the server or by problematic local network settings that just don't play well with League. I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your connection.
